text: AARON GREENBERG (early 20s) is walking across the stage getting his diploma. He could not be more excited. If you could bottle enthusiasm, generosity of spirit and a touch naivety, you would get this young gentleman. He gets his diploma, hugs the president of the university hard, and w to the crowd who cheer him on. He throws kisses towards someone in particular. ANGLE ON HIS PRETTY, ARTSY GIRLFRIEND, DAPHNE BINKS (earl 20s), also in a cap and gown, and her parents, MR. AND MR BINKS. She smiles, waves and throws kisses back.

We hear the VOICE of Aldous Snow (30s), English rock star drugged out of his mind, in his empty apartment. Floor to ceiling windows look out on beautiful views of the Thames the London cityscape. We PAN PAST a leather couch, a pile trash, an Andy Warhol on the floor, various drug paraphernalia.
